DPRK Delegation Leaves for Beijing  
   Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea headed by Kim Kye Gwan, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, left here today by air to participate in the six-party talks starting in Beijing on September 27.

Delegations Off  
   Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School led by Deputy Director Sin Yong Hun left here today by air to visit China. A delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union led by Vice-Chairwoman of its Central Committee Ro Song Sil flew here today to visit Switzerland.

Parte la delegacion de la RPDC a las conversaciones a 6 bandas 
   Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Partio este martes de esta capital por via aerea la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el vicecanciller Kim Kye Gwan, para participar en las conversaciones a 6 bandas que se iniciaran desde el 27 del mes en curso en Beijing.
